scripts.setup: docker exec -i cmfive bash -c "php cmfive.php testDB setup"
scripts.cleanup: echo "y" | bash cleanupTestMigrations.sh && docker exec cmfive bash -c "php cmfive.php DB test" -i
scripts.test: bash -c '${npm_config_clean:+npm run cleanup }' && bash -c 'npx playwright test --reporter=${npm_config_reporter:-list} --project=${npm_config_platform:-chromium} ${npm_config_module:+ --grep="$npm_config_module"}'
